divs: sighting detailsdriving north on texas highway 71 saw a strange circular shape with pulsing lights heading south hovering over 71, very low to ground only myself and one other car on highway we both slammed on breaks we both saw it was going south and going slow very strange shape didn't look like any kind of plane or anything circular lights around the outside bottom of the circle that were a burning white\blue. i was very amazed i didn't believe what i was seeing but it was there long enough to actually look at it and realise yes that's not a plane it's a ufo.
Summary: Circular UFO hovering over 71 in Texas heading south
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fayette
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
